thread.title: Soccer - Infantino says companies interested in expanded Club World Cup

title: Soccer - Infantino says companies interested in expanded Club World Cup
text:
April 12, 2018 / 5:11 PM / Updated 38 minutes ago Soccer - Infantino says companies interested in expanded Club World Cup   
BUENOS AIRES (Reuters) - FIFA president Gianni Infantino said on Thursday companies had shown an interest in backing an expanded Club World Cup and hinted that soccer’s world governing body was already moving towards a grander version of the annual tournament. FIFA President Gianni Infantino delivers a speech at the 68th Ordinary CONMEBOL Congress in Buenos Aires, Argentina April 12, 2018. REUTERS/Martin Acosta 
“There are companies that are interested and that is a good sign that there is interest,” Infantino told reporters at the annual conference of the South American Football Confederation (CONMEBOL). 
“The question is not if we have to do a more significant Club World Cub but rather why it hasn’t been done until now. It’s time to do it.” Reporting by Ramiro Scandolo, writing by Andrew Downie, editing by...
